name: OPEN THE FRIDGE
description: OPEN THE FRIDGE is an RPG Maker game about a young girl who has lost her siblings and parents in an accident and doesn't know it yet. You follow her journey throughout her house, after waking up from a nightmare, to go get some milk from the fridge, but the kitchen isn’t what she remembers it to be...This game's ending makes no sence at first, but once it takes you back to the title screen, quit. The game is done. I'm not messing around OK? Unless you want to play the game again, quit when it takes you back to the title screen!
